#### Find a
 
# Health Insurance Expert.
 
## We have amii members across the UK ready to help.
 
Simply fill in your details below to find a local expert who can help. If you’d like to further your knowledge before you do that, you can take a look at our [Health Insurance Q&As](https://amii.org.uk/health-insurance-qas/) or our [Health Insurance Glossary](https://amii.org.uk/health-insurance-glossary/). Both pages will open in a new browser tab so you can easily come back here.

### Join us today to discover the benefits
 
If you are an intermediary that is active in the health and wellbeing insurance market and would be interested in working more closely with your contemporaries in the industry please get in touch.
 
If you are an intermediary that is active in the health and wellbeing insurance market and would be interested in working more closely with your contemporaries in the industry please get in touch.
